trends: There have been 4 other sightings in McMinnville
There were no other sightings in McMinnville on or around January 20th 2008
Summary: I saw a metallic UFO flying over the smalls trees in McMinnville
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking to my work. To get there, I pass a long line of short tree shrubs. It was around 4 in the afternoon- I saw suddenly zooming over the trees, a smaill- Basket ball sized UFO- It was shining- And just flashing by- It has a strange pattern- It would stop and bob for a second or two and then keep going- It was a minute long flight over a mile = I thought earlier that day I heard a flashing,electronic sound in my ear. But I ignored it- I mentioned it- But after seeing the Probe as I call it- I felt it was connected to the sound I had heard-
